messages.title: Save Tax Credits from the Tory Axe - Vote Labour
messages.content: Labour investment or Tory Cuts? That is the real choice voters need to make at the forthcoming election... Every vote for the Tories is a vote to put our economic recovery at risk.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour believes that family tax credits are crucial. Efforts are described to protect them from cuts proposed by the opposing Tory party.
Dari is actively fighting to save jobs at Corus, reflecting Labour's focus on protecting workers and local jobs.
Labour is committed to maintaining funding for public services and highlights education with the promise of 'The best schools for all with Labour.'

issues.economy: Labour investment or Tory Cuts? That is the real choice voters need to make... Every vote for the Tories is a vote to put our economic recovery at risk.
issues.education: The best schools for all with Labour.
issues.socialWelfare: Save tax credits from the Tory axe.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm doing all I can to save these jobs.

quotes.text: Dari fought hard for the tax credits that make such a difference to my family finances.
quotes.source: A Real Story from a local resident

images.caption: Dari with local residents discussing the importance of tax credits.
Dari actively engaging in efforts to save jobs at Corus.
Dari Taylor outside a school showcasing Labour's commitment to education.
